resources.string: Security System for Debit & Credit Card
Security System For Debit & Credit Card Equipped With Pre-Confirmation Instruction.
Provides card less transactions for ATM, merchant and online.
If the user wants to block the card.
If the user wants to change password of the card.
If the user has lost or misplaced the card.
Provides multiple transactions for ATM, shopping transaction with one pre-confirmation.
Provides one transaction either for ATM or shopping.
Provides one or several transaction for ATM only.
If the user has found his card.
